FuncDef:
The set flow-statistics include-interframe command configures traffic statistics on an interface to contain the inter-frame gap and preamble.
The undo set flow-statistics include-interframe command configures traffic statistics on an interface not to contain the inter-frame gap and preamble. The set flow-statistics include-interframe command configures traffic statistics on an interface to contain the inter-frame gap and preamble. The undo set flow-statistics include-interframe command configures traffic statistics on an interface not to contain the inter-frame gap and preamble. By default, traffic statistics on an interface contain the inter-frame gap and preamble.
